title: Not so Gentle: spicy reverse harem at a London gentlemens' club
description: When Louise loses everything—her love, her dreams, her identity—she is left with only one to move forward. After the shocking end of her relationship with Eddi, the man she had devoted her entire life to, she finds herself standing amidst the ruins of her world. A mysterious job at the exclusive Hills Club appears to be her salvation, but there’s one major the club only hires men.Without hesitation, Louise transforms herself into "Louis" and steps into a world of secrets, power, and sinful temptations. Her disguise is quickly seen through by one Caleb Callaway, the arrogant and enigmatic son of the club’s owner. But instead of exposing her, Caleb offers his support—at a price.Caught between smoldering passion with Caleb and the magnetic pull of other club members, like the charismatic Henry, Louise is forced to confront not only her newly awakened desires but also the constant fear of being discovered. Yet, as she indulges in the allure of the forbidden, her past resurfaces, and the shadows of Eddi threaten to destroy everything she’s fought for.
author: Scarlett Hart
